meta_data.description: 1170 Sq. Ft. - Rent 2 BHK Apartment / Flat in CRC Sublimis, Sector 1 Greater Noida West * 10 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 10th floor (out of 24). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Greater noida's most popular society crc sublimis in sector 1 greater noida west offers 2 bhk apartment. The flat is close to school and close to hospital. This flat consists of 2 bathrooms & 3 balconies build in 1170 sq.Ft. Super built-Up area. Flat is constructed on 1170 sq.Ft. You get an additional space of study room. 1 covered parking available. Placed on 10th of 24 floor in 1-5 years old tower. This property is semi-Furnished. Equipped with 18 light, 5 fan, 2 wardrobe, 1 geyser, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. The flat will be available from sun, 26 oct 2025 for family on company lease with a notice of 6 months for a duration of 11 months. The expected rent is  29,000 monthly and is negotiable. Electricity & water charges are excluded. Security deposit of  29000 is required. This flat has all latest feature like reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm, intercom facility, high ceiling height, false ceiling lighting, piped-Gas, internet/wi-Fi connectivity, water purifier, recently renovated, centrally air conditioned, private garden / terrace, natural light, airy rooms and spacious interiors. Society provides modern lifestyle facilities like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, cctv surveillance, lift(s), maintenance staff, visitor parking, water softening plant, shopping centre and security personnel. There are more things to like about this property such as rain water harvesting, separate entry for servant room, waste disposal, no open drainage around, bank attached property, low density society, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat is facing towards north-East. The flat has polished concrete flooring.
